title: Streamixio
author: Streamixio
created_time: August 27, 2023, 01:57:08 PMLast edit: August 29, 2023, 04:14:13 AM by Streamixio
content: UltiChain | Hybrid of PoS and PoW | Community Driven Blockchain | JUST LISTED ON XEGGEXDecentralized, Eco-friendly, and Secure. UltiChain is a community-driven, versatile hybrid blockchain that empowers the users to harness the inherent advantages of both Bitcoins Proof-Of-Work and Etherums Proof-Of-Stake systems to minimize the weaknesses!Ultichain represents a groundbreaking advancement in the world of blockchain technology, specifically tailored for the X11 protocol. Building upon the foundation of X11, Ultichain aims to redefine digital currency by addressing the limitations of previous alternatives. Our vision is to provide a seamless, decentralized peer-to-peer internet currency that enables swift, low-cost global transactions.Our progress so fare:‚úÖ Blockchain started‚úÖ Website hosted‚úÖ Whitepaper‚úÖ Ulti Desktop Wallet‚úÖ Ultichain Explorer‚úÖ Mining Pools‚úÖ First Exchange Listing ‚úÖ Listed on XeggexMarketing & PromotionCoinmarketcap (Tracker)CoinGecko (Tracker)Live Coin Watch (Tracker)MinningPoolStats (Tracker)ULTI - Secured Wallets: Web ‚ùñ Total Supply: 111.000.000 Ulti‚ùñ Circulating: 2.351.000 Ulti‚ùñ Team Tokens: 4%‚ùñ Governance (Community voting and decides) 11% fee on every block‚ùñ Advisors: 0,4%‚ùñ Staking: 42,3%‚ùñ Mining: 42,3%BONUS| FOR TAKING PART IN THE COMMUNITY EARLY || Theres 50 Ulti pr. block! Mining and staking shares 50/50. comments.author: Ultichain
comments.body: The 11% is the governance and is community driven. The 4% premine is the teams coins, salary, further development, half of this is locked for 4 years then vested every month.

comments.author: Cynce
comments.body: Quote from: Ultichain on August 28, 2023, 03:23:50 AMThe 11% is the governance and is community driven. The 4% premine is the teams coins, salary, further development, half of this is locked for 4 years then vested every month. Pretty sure if you put 11% to a community vote it will fail unless this is 2021 and I got lost. Good luck with your project.

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added Ultichain (ULTI) to http://zpool.ca/algo/x11. See below for connection details.Fee only: 1% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine x11 and get paid in ULTI:Code:-a x11 -o stratum+tcp://x11.mine.zpool.ca:3533 -u ULTI_ADDRESS -p c=ULTI Exchange to BTC:Code:-a x11 -o stratum+tcp://x11.mine.zpool.ca:3533 -u BTC_ADDRESS -p c=BTCAll of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for x11: 53533==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: anmining on November 10, 2023, 08:09:52 PMDiscord or support contact?Discord link broke.I have a problem with explorer:I have ultichain wallet with amount, but can¬¥t find my wallet adress in the explorer.Please provide support contact.This thread is not very active, are you sure you want to spend some of your resources on this alt?Most community driven projects here didn't survive long. Let alone be listed in a decent exchange. Maybe look for more valuable projects out there. Though I don't know if you are mining or just staking.Also, you can check their other social media channels to see how their devs are doing on this project. If it is community driven, the possibility of lack of funds maybe is their main hurdle to push thru their plans.
